Population attributable fraction

Source: vignettes/Population attributable fraction.Rmd
Population attributable fraction.Rmd

Population attributable fraction

The proportional reduction in population disease or mortality would occur if exposure to a risk factor were reduced to an alternative ideal exposure scenario. The number of deaths and DALYs attributed to a risk factor is quantified by applying the population attributable fraction to the total number of deaths or the total burden of disease (118).
